SourceAnalyzer.Name: + More Custom Rules
SourceAnalyzer.Description: More custom rules represented by Shuruev StyleCop plug-in.

Rule.Name: CodeLineMustNotEndWithWhitespace
Rule.Context: Invalid spacing at the end of the line.
Rule.Description: Validates the spacing at the end of the each code line.

Rule.Name: CodeLineMustBeginWithIdenticalWhitespaces
Rule.Context: You should not use different characters for indention.
Rule.Description: Validates that spacing at the beginning of the each code line uses identical characters.
